title: Death Recap update is overdue.
body:
The deathrecap screen has a few inconcistancies and it looks like it contributes to how people misunderstand what happens when they die.

For example: Took 2000 damage from Yasuo's Q
Person reacts to this: wtf yasuo does 2k damage with 1 q
Me: no you dingus, it takes into concideration the total damage from several q's!

The interface looks old too, It doesn't display how many times 1 ability was used and basic attacks are not considered as magic damage or true damage only pure physical damage without any crits.

And there are lots of cases where certain things are left blank like: [   ] took 44 damage from [Player name] BUT LIKE WHAT DID THIS DAMAGE.

Thoughts and suggestions please! We need to work together with this not against one another.

Come to think of it, thanks to the recent Hawkshot buff to Ashe I got kill credit on a Lee Sin I revealed - and who got subsequently killed by our mid turrets with nothing else doing damage to him. I'm very curious to know if Hawkshot actually appeared in his Death Recap xD
I don’t think so because the death recap would only show damage that helped killed you. And Hawkshot doesn’t deal damage to people it reveals.

Well, my janna's zephyr isn't supposed to hurt me, she's on my team after all, but I guess I might've made her angry because in one of my death recaps, I saw zephyr did 200 damage to me. So if that can do damage to me, I wouldn't be surprised if hawkshot showed damage dealt.

Well you are comparing apples with oranges. Hawkshot deals no damage at all, but Zephyr deals damage and slows the enemy unit. That’s like saying an enemy ward dealt X amount of damage to you if you died shorty after walking in the vision range of the ward. And we both know that wards don’t deal any damage at all.

On the topic of Hawkshot, it gives the Ashe assist gold if the killed enemy was revealed by Hawkshot before the enemy’s death. So your fed Kha zix is in the enemy jungle and you use your Hawkshot to help kha see if the enemy red is up, your W shows that it is up and that the Enemy jungler (who is low on hp) is trying to take it, Kha then jumps in and kills the Enemy jungler and you get assist gold because your w revealed the Enemy jungler. 
I think riot made Hawkshot able to grant you assist gold because almost all of the other abilities that reveal enemies have damage or another helpful effect tied in with it (like ignite and Swain’s W).

All in all, i think death recaps is something riot should work on improving, like i said the game has changed a lot the past few years, but death recaps remain largely the same, and i cant forget about all the bugs  death recaps have. Like not showing what abilities the enemies hit you with you  just see damage  numbers and no champion name either, or sometimes it even says my teammates hurt me, yeah Riot  my Vi jungle on my team totally did 300 damage to me because that makes sense.
Death recaps NEED bug fixes and improvements
